com.google.api.gax.grpc

Class OperationCallable<RequestT,ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.gax.grpc.OperationCallable<RequestT,ResponseT>

  • public final class OperationCallable<RequestT,ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends Object
    An OperationCallable is an immutable object which is capable of initiating RPC calls to long-running API methods and returning an OperationFuture to manage the polling of the Operation and getting the response.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static <RequestT,ResponseT extends com.google.protobuf.Message> OperationCallable<RequestT,ResponseT> create(OperationCallSettings<RequestT,ResponseT> operationCallSettings,
                                                                                                                    io.grpc.Channel channel,
                                                                                                                    ScheduledExecutorService executor,
                                                                                                                    OperationsClient operationsClient)
        Creates a callable object that represents a long-running operation. Public only for technical reasons - for advanced usage
        Parameters:
        operationCallSettings - OperationCallSettings to configure the method-level settings with.
        channel - Channel to use to connect to the service.
        executor - ScheduledExecutorService to use to schedule polling work.
        operationsClient - OperationsClient to use to poll for updates on the Operation.
        Returns:
        OperationCallable callable object.

      • futureCall

        public OperationFuture<ResponseT> futureCall(RequestT request,
                                             CallContext context)
        Initiates an operation asynchronously. If the Channel encapsulated in the given CallContext is null, a channel must have already been bound either at construction time or using bind(Channel).
        Parameters:
        request - The request to initiate the operation.
        context - CallContext to make the call with
        Returns:
        OperationFuture for the call result

      • futureCall

        public OperationFuture<ResponseT> futureCall(RequestT request)
        Same as futureCall(Object, CallContext), with null Channel and default CallOptions.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to initiate the operation.
        Returns:
        OperationFuture for the call result

      • call

        public ResponseT call(RequestT request,
                      CallContext context)
        Initiates an operation and polls for the final result. If the Channel encapsulated in the given CallContext is null, a channel must have already been bound, using bind(Channel).
        Parameters:
        request - The request to initiate the operation.
        context - CallContext to make the call with
        Returns:
        the call result
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is any bad status in the response.
        com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException - if there is any other exception unrelated to bad status.

      • call

        public ResponseT call(RequestT request)
        Same as call(Object, CallContext), with null Channel and default CallOptions.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to initiate the operation.
        Returns:
        the call result
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is any bad status in the response.
        com.google.common.util.concurrent.UncheckedExecutionException - if there is any other exception unrelated to bad status.

      • resumeFutureCall

        public OperationFuture<ResponseT> resumeFutureCall(String operationName)
        Creates a new OperationFuture to watch an operation that has been initiated previously. Note: This is not type-safe at static time; the result type can only be checked once the operation finishes.
        Parameters:
        operationName -
        Returns:
